alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:04AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 403 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrabelle, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Mcintyre, Lanark Village, Curtis Mill and Panacea-Wakulla Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin
